The Praise of the Vows of Bodhisattva Samantabhadra, which quickly fulfills the vows of Samantabhadra, states the dharani:

Xiang mo xi di li ye di wei jia nan tuo nan o mang a xu ba ra wei ji ni sa wa ha, every day after reciting the Praise of the Vows of Bodhisattva Samantabhadra, recite this mantra. As soon as one recitation is completed, the vows of Samantabhadra will all be fulfilled. Practitioners of samadhi will quickly attain the manifestation of samadhi, and with the two adornments of merit and wisdom, they will attain the firm Dharma and quickly accomplish it.
